meta.description: Levelll is a specialized application for water and sewage monitoring! This is an online app, which monitors: reservoir levels, water quality, turbidity, dissolved chemicals, pressure and other useful water indicators. It is proven to be stable and intelligent, and if necessary, automation can be included, which, for example, will easily control an electric actuator installed on a shut-off valve...

why-levelll.p0: Maybe you questioned yourself - "Okay, but… why Levelll?"
why-levelll.p1: Levelll is a specialized application for water and sewage monitoring! This is an online app, which monitors: reservoir levels, water quality, turbidity, dissolved chemicals, pressure and other useful water indicators. It is proven to be stable and intelligent, and if necessary, automation can be included, which, for example, will easily control an electric actuator installed on a shut-off valve...
why-levelll.p2: The short answer is based on the facts that Levelll is modern, open-sourced, full of useful features and most importantly - we value our customers’ privacy and we will never share any data with anyone.
why-levelll.p3: Have you ever seen a system take full control of a water filtration facility?
why-levelll.p4: Have you ever seen incoming water pipes correcting the flow based on water quality or turbidity?
why-levelll.p5: Have you ever heard an alarm sounding or notifications being sent when there are critical values?
why-levelll.p6: Everything from above with the ability to configure and control everything from your phone… no matter where you are or where your facility is located.
why-levelll.p7: Sounds impossible, but we made it :)

features.infrastructure-paragraph: Levelll is fully cloud-based and is running across multiple availability zones. This guarantees you 100% uptime and extremely fast response times from our system whenever and wherever you need it.
features.mobile-paragraph: Levelll is ultra-light and combined with it’s mobile-friendly design it is the perfect fit for all applications. You can open Levelll on any device you want. Our infrastructure gives you the ability to see real-time data in the palm of your hand. Sounds cool, right?
features.privacy-paragraph: We will never share any of your data with anyone, unless you choose to do so. We believe that our clients should choose how their data is treated. You can create and manage custom dashboards which you can share with anyone, anytime. Our secure data stores are located in one of the biggest cloud providers, this makes your data’s security rock-solid.

about.title: About
about.p1: Levelll started out as a custom solution for water level monitoring back in 2016. At the very beginning it was only able to log water levels and show them to water facility employees.
about.p2: Throughout the past few years the system evolved quite a lot and our dev team had integrated lots of additional functionalities, needed for water facilities to be controlled from the palm of your hand, or even left running on fully automatic mode for simpler facilities.
about.p3: In early 2020 our team started working on a public service, which will be available for all water facilities worldwide to join. We plan to open-source Levelll by the end of 2020, so anyone can run it on their own hardware for non-commercial use.

privacy-policy.p2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacy-policy.p3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacy-policy.p4: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
privacy-policy.p5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
privacy-policy.p6: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.

privacy-policy.p8: This policy is effective as of 16 April 2020.
